revised_title: Resonance Charge Transfer Between H(1s) and H: Atomic Eigenfunction Approximation
tldr: The authors present a study on resonance charge transfer between hydrogen atoms using an atomic eigenfunction approximation. They derive an expression for the cross-section describing electron capture by protons in atomic hydrogen, taking into account momentum transfer and the non-orthogonality of wave functions of initial and final states. The results show agreement with previous calculations in the low and high energy limits.
